title: The 5 best Amazon deals you can get this Friday
text:
The 5 best Amazon deals you can get this Friday

Save big this Friday on products you'll love. (Photo: Reviewed)

— Our editors review and recommend products to help you buy the stuff you need. If you make a purchase by clicking one of our links, we may earn a small share of the revenue. However, our picks and opinions are independent from USA Today’s newsroom and any business incentives.

Hey there Friday, I've been waiting for you since Monday if I'm being honest. It's been a long week, but I always like to ring in the weekend by doing what I do best: online shopping. To be fair, it's actually my job to research the best deals for you all each day, looking at price histories, reviews, and cross-referencing them with the products we've tested to help our readers shop smartly and save big. And today I've found some doozies—from some amazing Sony headphones to a mega-popular French press, here are the top five deals on Amazon that should be on your radar.

1. Lowest price ever: Amazing noise-canceling headphones with extra bass

Finally some peace and quiet. (Photo: Sony)

Earlier this year, Sony disrupted the noise-canceling headphone market with the release of the WH-1000XM3 noise cancelling headphones. They’re our favorite noise-canceling headphones—even better than Bose's insanely popular QuietComfort series—and right now, there is a similar pair on sale for a great low price on Amazon. The WH-XB900N headphones are usually $248, but right now you can get them for $50 off, the best price we've ever seen. These headphones are $100 cheaper than the XM3s because they don't feature the same active noise canceling technology. But they still have noise cancelation and also offer extra bass so you can really sink into your beats, as well as 30 hours of battery life, touch controls, and Alexa and Google Assistant connectivity.

Get the Sony WH-XB900N Wireless Extra Bass Headphones on Amazon for $198 (Save $52)

2. Under $20: One of our favorite French presses

For the best cup of coffee you'll ever make. (Photo: Bodum)

As the cold weather approaches, making a daily Starbucks run is going to become less and less desirable. Instead, you can brew yourself a barista-level cup of joe right from the comfort of your own kitchen with a French press. This one from Bodum has a solid ranking in our list of the best French presses, as it produced a smooth, aromatic cup of coffee, and was intuitively designed. The one downside is that there's no cover in front of the pouring spout, so your coffee will cool down faster, but that shouldn't be a problem if you're making it for the family or are just a caffeine-addict yourself. Right now, you can get it for a super low price—just over $15.

Get the Bodum Brazil French Press Coffee Maker for $15.25 (Save $4.75)

3. Save $50: This popular smart thermostat

Control the temp in your home, while you're away . (Photo: Honeywell)

If you're like almost all the dads out there, you might be a stickler when it comes to the thermostat in your home. As in, the heat shouldn't be turned up past 62 degrees in the winter unless everyone is wearing a long sleeve shirt, pants, wool socks, and at least one sweater. For those types, a smart thermostat will be your best friend. They allow you to remotely control the temperature in your home from anywhere in the world, so you can ensure none of the fam is trying to jack up the electric bill. Right now, one of the most streamlined, affordable models, the Honeywell T5+ Smart Thermostat, just dropped to its lowest price ever—$81.02, to be exact, if you clip the on-page coupon. Its predecessor was a solid performer in our ranking of the best smart thermostats, so we expect even better performance with this newer model.

Get the Honeywell T5+ Smart Thermostat for $81.02 (Save $48.97)

4. 20% off: The popular Tile Mate so you never lose your keys

Keep track of your phone, keys, and wallet with the Tile. (Photo: Tile)

With over 1,500 reviews and a 4-star rating, the Tile Mate is certainly making waves. This tracker was made for the scatter-brained among us, as it's super helpful to locate those items that you always seem to misplace—your phone, keys, or wallet to name a few. With the press of a button, the Tile will play loudly enough so you can hear it from up to 300 feet away. You can snatch one up right now for just $16.25, when it usually fluctuates between $20 and $25.

Get the Tile Mate for $16.25 (Save $3.74)

5. Lowest price ever: This Clorox ToiletWand Disposable Kit

Upgrade that dirty toilet brush with a more hygienic version. (Photo: Clorox)

Do you ever stop and think about just how dirty and germ-ridden your toilet brush is? It's even yucky that such a thing resides in the room we use to get clean. There's an alternative luckily, and it comes in the form of this Clorox ToiletWand that comes with 6 disposable sponges that are designed to deep clean all the scum, stains, and germs from your toilet bowl, and then be conveniently popped off and thrown in the trash. Right now, if you select "one time purchase" and clip the on-page coupon, you can get 25% off this magic wand, and be one step closer to a more hygienic way of cleaning your wiz palace.

Get the Clorox ToiletWand Disposable Kit for $6.66 (Save $2.22)
